DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study study effect probiotic product iron absorption healthy female child-bearing age .
DOC.brief_title: Study Iron Absorption From Capsules Containing Lactobacilli Iron
DOC.criteria: Female Age ≥19 ≤45 year Hb > 117g/L Gastrointestinal disease Metabolic diseases Use probiotic product study 2 week study start Pregnant breastfeed A serum ferritin level > 60 µg/L Medication ( oral contraceptive allow ) Intake dietary supplement ( incl . iron ) study two week study start No blood donation last 2 month High Creactive protein level
